H0.text: What kind of aircraft gave the space shuttle a piggy-back prior to 1981. Boeing 707

H1.text: What kind of aircraft gave the space shuttle a piggy-back prior to 1981. Lockheed C-5 Galaxy

H2.text: What kind of aircraft gave the space shuttle a piggy-back prior to 1981. Boeing 747

H3.text: What kind of aircraft gave the space shuttle a piggy-back prior to 1981. 74M

A4.text: Two 747s were modified to carry the Space Shuttle orbiter.

A5.text: The first SCA carried the prototype Enterprise during the Approach and Landing Tests in the late 1970s.
